synopsis.text: The story follows Tadayasu, a first-year student at an Agriculture University with an extraordinary gift: the ability to see and communicate with microorganisms, including bacteria. His unique talent often lands him in peculiar situations, as he navigates college life alongside his childhood friend, Kei. As they embark on their university journey, Tadayasu's world becomes even more colorful and chaotic, filled with eccentric classmates, ambitious upperclassmen, and a sadistic postgraduate. With his ability attracting the attention of professors, especially the fermentation specialist Professor Itsuki, Tadayasu slowly learns to appreciate his gift and the tiny, chibi-like organisms that surround him. Prepare for a wild ride filled with laughter, learning, and microscopic adventures in this one-of-a-kind college experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
